modName: Correct ps3 button icons and skyui 3 compatibility
summary:
This is a small list of how to make both mods work together on skyrim version 1.8.x
Currently working with SkyUI 3.2
descriptionHtml:
This is just a tutorial on how to manually install "Correct PS3 button icons" over skyui 3.x. - Currently working with SkyUI 3.2

First, download and install the lastest version of SkyUI - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863

Second, download and install SkyUI PS3 icons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29450

Last, download Correct ps3 button icons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/92

----------------------------------------------------

List of Correct PS3 buttons SAFE files.
[you can drag and drop these files into your data folder]

/interface/inventory components/itemcard.swf
/interface/exported/*
/interface/controls/*
/interface/trainingmenu.swf
/interface/startmenu.swf
/interface/sleepwaitmenu.swf
/interface/sharedcomponents.swf
/interface/lockpickingmenu.swf
/interface/dialoguemenu.swf
/interface/craftingmenu.swf
/interface/bookmenu.swf


List of Correct PS3 buttons BROKEN files.
[not working properly as of version 1.8.x of skyrim]

/interface/map.swf


List of Correct PS3 buttons INCOMPATIBLE files.
[these menus are changed by skyui, making these files incompatible]

/interface/inventory components/bottombar.swf
/interface/magicmenu.swf
/interface/inventorymenu.swf
/interface/giftmenu.swf
/interface/containermenu.swf
/interface/bartermenu.swf


List of Correct PS3 buttons files with UNKNOWN COMPATIBILITY.
[I'm not sure what this file does, so I've chosen to keep it away, considering the filename]

/interface/inventorylists.swf

---------------------------------------------

With this, most of skyrim interface buttons will show as PS3 icons instead of Xbox. There are still some that remain unchanged [Map and a few more] but this temporary fix will do until a new mod to fix this comes up, or either of said mod is updated to change all buttons.
author: emieri00

files.name: List of skyui compatible sony icon files

files.changelogHtml: Added a note about bottombar.swf - makes the "change" menu button to switch between bagic and items stop working if installed
